Revisar la escritura

  • The statements begin with capital letters, you have correctly used punctuation marks, and you do not have spelling errors.
  • Do not unnecessarily repeat some words. If so, strike them out and replace them with synonyms, hypernyms, or pronouns.
  • That you have used words typical of explanatory texts and not of everyday life.
  • You have used connectors to relate the statements to each other and to the subtitle.
